pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dynamic Comparative Public Opinion // Estimates latent variables of public opinion cross-nationally and over time from sparse and incomparable survey data. 'DCPO' uses a population-level graded response model with country-specific item bias terms. Sampling is conducted with 'Stan'. References: Solt (2020) doi:10.31235/osf.io/d5n9p.
